name: Industrial Infiltrator
description:
Blast your way through an army of drones to get to the end!

Controls:
A and D to move
Spacebar or W to jump
Aim and left click with the mouse to shoot
1, 2, or 3 to change weapons

Coding: ShawnTheSheep
Art: StressfulAsianStudio, RebelliousRobot, Gabe F
Level Design: Readypercival
Music: Badass - bensound.com
SFX: ShawnTheSheep made on ChipTone
